amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the restriction on federal land acquisition.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 113-340 to strike the restriction on federal land acquisition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 224 (Roll no. 51).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 224 (Roll no. 51).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
